name: Lies and Fantasy
description:
My entry for the community jam (theme: the game is a liar).

Don't trust the game!

Turn based RPG.

How to play

Use arrows or "wasd" to move and space to confirm. Joypads should also work (not tested).

PS: you can use the source code to build a version for another OS, it is there on purpose.

You can also check out the code and edit the game, however after a couple of days I stopped documenting (and made a lot of mess with the battle system) so I don't recommend it, unless you really want to get an headache.
